Package appeng.api.util

Interface IOrientable

All Known Subinterfaces:
IChestOrDrive, IMEChest
public interface IOrientable
Nearly all of AE's Block entities implement IOrientable. and it can be used to manipulate the direction of some machines, most of these orientations are purely visual. AE also responds to Block.rotateBlock

    • canBeRotated

      boolean canBeRotated()
      Returns:
